content:
Competitive programming class

Upcoming Events

  • May 19, 2018 10:30am - 4:00pm @ Cal Poly Pomona : 2018 California High School Programming Contest
  • Feb 23-26: USACO - Third Contest
  • (College student only) March 24 (Saturday), 2018, 12:00pm - 5:00pm (Central time): ACM-ICPC - The 2018 North American Invitational Programming Contest (online)
  • April 6th, Cornell University High School Programming Contest @ Cornell campus
  • July ?, TBA Internet Problem Solving Contest (IPSC)

Useful Links

  • exercise link
  • CodinGame
  • Leetcode
  • USA Olympid
  • USA Olympid Training
  • Hacker Rank Web

USA Computing Olympiad Schedule

  • Dec 15-18: First Contest
  • Jan 19-22: Second Contest
  • Feb 23-26: Third Contest
  • Mar 23-26: US Open
  • May 24-Jun 2: Training Camp
  • Sep 1-8: IOI 2018 in Japan

The 2018 ACM-ICPC Regional Contest

  • The 2018 North American Invitational Programming Contest - 24 Mar 2018
  • Registration between 22 Dec - 21 Mar 2018

The 2018 ACM-ICPC World Finals

  • More Details Coming Soon
  • Team and RCD Arrival - April 15, 2018
  • ACM-ICPC World Finals - April 19, 2018
  • Team and RCD Departure - April 20, 2018

2018 California High School Programming Contest

  • Link, Prev Problem
  • May 19, 2018 10:30am - 4:00pm @ Cal Poly Pomona
  • Who? The competition is open to all California high school students (public, private, or home schools). A high school student is any student currently enrolled in grades 9-12. Advanced junior high and graduating seniors are also welcome to participate.

Class Slides

  • 1. Checklist (Syntax, Loop, Type, etc.)
  • -- Announcement --
  • 2. Data structure
  • 3. Sorting
  • 4. Searching
  • -- USACO Practice 2016 December Bronze/Silver --
  • 5. Sorting 2. Sort by key (implementation) and Merge Sort
  • Practice Project 1 - BigNumber Calculator
  • Need to write Progress Keeper!! From today's progress. Not need to record previous problems.
  • 6. Sorting 3. Quick Sort (Not yet)
  • 7. Tree and Binary Search Tree (Not yet)
  • 8. Sorting 4. Heap Sort (Not yet)

Homework To Do

  • 1. USACO Training Sec 1.2: Your Ride Is Here
  • 2. USACO Training Sec 1.2: Greedy Gift Givers
  • 3. Class Material: Sorting Basic - Bubble, Insertion, Selection
  • 4. Class Material: Search - binary search (iterative version)
  • 5. USACO 2016 December Bronze: Square Pasture
  • 6. USACO 2016 December Bronze: Block Game
  • 7. USACO 2016 December Bronze: The Cow-Signal
  • 8. USACO 2016 December Silver: Counting Haybales
  • 9. Class Material: Big Number Calculator
  • 10. USACO Training Sec 1.2: Friday The Thirteenth (go training)
  • 11. USACO Training Sec 1.2: Broken Necklace (go training)
  • 11.1 USACO Training Sec 1.3: Milking Cows (go training)
  • 12. Class Material: Sort 2 -Merge sort
  • 13. Cal Poly Pomona - High school Programming Contest - Prev problem set
  • 14. USACO 2017 January Bronze: Don't be Last!
  • 15. USACO 2017 January Bronze: Hoof, Paper, Scissors
  • 16. USACO 2017 January Bronze: Cow Tipping
  • 17. USACO 2017 January Silver: Cow Dance Show -- something wrong?
  • 18. USACO 2017 February Bronze: Why Did the Cow Cross the Road
  • 19. USACO 2017 February Bronze: Why Did the Cow Cross the Road II

  • 21. USACO 2017 February Silver: Why Did the Cow Cross the Road II
